taskbody.context: Use this procedure to upgrade a high-availability deployment of .

step.cmd: Use the virtual hostname or virtual IP address of the high-availability cluster to log in to the master node as a user with serviced CLI privileges.

step.stepresult: The upgrade process begins. If you encounter errors, refer to the Recovery appendix in the Upgrade Guide for release 6.2.1.

step.info: Some services are started during the upgrade, and they must be restarted.
